62  /**
63   * Tests for function support on CacheSQL...
64   *
65   * @author Jonathan Levinson
66   */
67  @RequiresDialect( value = Cache71Dialect.class )
68  public class SQLFunctionsInterSystemsTest extends BaseCoreFunctionalTestCase {
69  	private static final Logger log = Logger.getLogger( SQLFunctionsInterSystemsTest.class );
70  
71  	public String[] getMappings() {
72  		return new String[] {
73  				"legacy/AltSimple.hbm.xml",
74  				"legacy/Broken.hbm.xml",
75  				"legacy/Blobber.hbm.xml",
76  				"dialect/functional/cache/TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass.hbm.xml"
77  		};
78  	}
79  
80  	@Test
81  	@SuppressWarnings( {"UnnecessaryBoxing"})
82  	public void testDialectSQLFunctions() throws Exception {
83  		Session s = openSession();
84  		Transaction t = s.beginTransaction();
85  
86  		Simple simple = new Simple( Long.valueOf( 10 ) );
87  		simple.setName("Simple Dialect Function Test");
88  		simple.setAddress("Simple Address");
89  		simple.setPay(new Float(45.8));
90  		simple.setCount(2);
91  		s.save( simple );
92  
93  		// Test to make sure allocating an specified object operates correctly.
94  		assertTrue(
95  				s.createQuery( "select new org.hibernate.test.legacy.S(s.count, s.address) from Simple s" ).list().size() == 1
96  		);
97  
98  		// Quick check the base dialect functions operate correctly
99  		assertTrue(
100 				s.createQuery( "select max(s.count) from Simple s" ).list().size() == 1
101 		);
102 		assertTrue(
103 				s.createQuery( "select count(*) from Simple s" ).list().size() == 1
104 		);
105 
106 		List rset = s.createQuery( "select s.name, sysdate, floor(s.pay), round(s.pay,0) from Simple s" ).list();
107 		assertNotNull("Name string should have been returned",(((Object[])rset.get(0))[0]));
108 		assertNotNull("Todays Date should have been returned",(((Object[])rset.get(0))[1]));
109 		assertEquals("floor(45.8) result was incorrect ", new Integer(45), ( (Object[]) rset.get(0) )[2] );
110 		assertEquals("round(45.8) result was incorrect ", new Float(46), ( (Object[]) rset.get(0) )[3] );
111 
112 		simple.setPay(new Float(-45.8));
113 		s.update(simple);
114 
115 		// Test type conversions while using nested functions (Float to Int).
116 		rset = s.createQuery( "select abs(round(s.pay,0)) from Simple s" ).list();
117 		assertEquals("abs(round(-45.8)) result was incorrect ", new Float(46), rset.get(0));
118 
119 		// Test a larger depth 3 function example - Not a useful combo other than for testing
120 		assertTrue(
121 				s.createQuery( "select floor(round(sysdate,1)) from Simple s" ).list().size() == 1
122 		);
123 
124 		// Test the oracle standard NVL funtion as a test of multi-param functions...
125 		simple.setPay(null);
126 		s.update(simple);
127 		Double value = (Double) s.createQuery("select mod( nvl(s.pay, 5000), 2 ) from Simple as s where s.id = 10").list().get(0);
128 		assertTrue( 0 == value.intValue() );
129 
130 		// Test the hsql standard MOD funtion as a test of multi-param functions...
131 		value = (Double) s.createQuery( "select MOD(s.count, 2) from Simple as s where s.id = 10" )
132 				.list()
133 				.get(0);
134 		assertTrue( 0 == value.intValue() );
135 
136         s.delete(simple);
137 		t.commit();
138 		s.close();
139 	}
140 
141 	@SuppressWarnings( {"UnnecessaryBoxing", "unchecked"})
142 	public void testSetProperties() throws Exception {
143 		Session s = openSession();
144 		Transaction t = s.beginTransaction();
145 		Simple simple = new Simple( Long.valueOf( 10 ) );
146 		simple.setName("Simple 1");
147 		s.save( simple );
148 		Query q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name=:name and s.count=:count");
149 		q.setProperties(simple);
150 		assertTrue( q.list().get(0)==simple );
151 		//misuse of "Single" as a propertyobject, but it was the first testclass i found with a collection ;)
152 		Single single = new Single() { // trivial hack to test properties with arrays.
153 			@SuppressWarnings( {"unchecked"})
154 			String[] getStuff() { 
155 				return (String[]) getSeveral().toArray(new String[getSeveral().size()]);
156 			}
157 		};
158 
159 		List l = new ArrayList();
160 		l.add("Simple 1");
161 		l.add("Slimeball");
162 		single.setSeveral(l);
163 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name in (:several)");
164 		q.setProperties(single);
165 		assertTrue( q.list().get(0)==simple );
166 
167 
168 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name in (:stuff)");
169 		q.setProperties(single);
170 		assertTrue( q.list().get(0)==simple );
171 		s.delete(simple);
172 		t.commit();
173 		s.close();
174 	}
175 
176 	@SuppressWarnings( {"UnnecessaryBoxing"})
177 	public void testBroken() throws Exception {
178 		Session s = openSession();
179 		Transaction t = s.beginTransaction();
180 		Broken b = new Fixed();
181 		b.setId( Long.valueOf( 123 ));
182 		b.setOtherId("foobar");
183 		s.save(b);
184 		s.flush();
185 		b.setTimestamp( new Date() );
186 		t.commit();
187 		s.close();
188 
189 		s = openSession();
190 		t = s.beginTransaction();
191 		s.update(b);
192 		t.commit();
193 		s.close();
194 
195 		s = openSession();
196 		t = s.beginTransaction();
197 		b = (Broken) s.load( Broken.class, b );
198 		t.commit();
199 		s.close();
200 
201 		s = openSession();
202 		t = s.beginTransaction();
203 		s.delete(b);
204 		t.commit();
205 		s.close();
206 	}

208 	@SuppressWarnings( {"UnnecessaryBoxing"})
209 	public void testNothinToUpdate() throws Exception {
210 		Session s = openSession();
211 		Transaction t = s.beginTransaction();
212 		Simple simple = new Simple( Long.valueOf(10) );
213 		simple.setName("Simple 1");
214 		s.save( simple );
215 		t.commit();
216 		s.close();
217 
218 		s = openSession();
219 		t = s.beginTransaction();
220 		s.update( simple );
221 		t.commit();
222 		s.close();
223 
224 		s = openSession();
225 		t = s.beginTransaction();
226 		s.update( simple );
227 		s.delete(simple);
228 		t.commit();
229 		s.close();
230 	}

232 	@SuppressWarnings( {"UnnecessaryBoxing"})
233 	public void testCachedQuery() throws Exception {
234 		Session s = openSession();
235 		Transaction t = s.beginTransaction();
236 		Simple simple = new Simple( Long.valueOf(10) );
237 		simple.setName("Simple 1");
238 		s.save( simple );
239 		t.commit();
240 		s.close();
241 
242 		s = openSession();
243 		t = s.beginTransaction();
244 		Query q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name=?");
245 		q.setCacheable(true);
246 		q.setString(0, "Simple 1");
247 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
248 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
249 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
250 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name=:name");
251 		q.setCacheable(true);
252 		q.setString("name", "Simple 1");
253 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
254 		simple = (Simple) q.list().get(0);
255 
256 		q.setString("name", "Simple 2");
257 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==0 );
258 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==0 );
259 		simple.setName("Simple 2");
260 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
261 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
262 		t.commit();
263 		s.close();
264 
265 		s = openSession();
266 		t = s.beginTransaction();
267 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name=:name");
268 		q.setString("name", "Simple 2");
269 		q.setCacheable(true);
270 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
271 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
272 		t.commit();
273 		s.close();
274 
275 		s = openSession();
276 		t = s.beginTransaction();
277 		s.update( simple );
278 		s.delete(simple);
279 		t.commit();
280 		s.close();
281 
282 		s = openSession();
283 		t = s.beginTransaction();
284 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name=?");
285 		q.setCacheable(true);
286 		q.setString(0, "Simple 1");
287 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==0 );
288 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==0 );
289 		t.commit();
290 		s.close();
291 	}
292 
293 	@SuppressWarnings( {"UnnecessaryBoxing"})
294 	public void testCachedQueryRegion() throws Exception {
295 		Session s = openSession();
296 		Transaction t = s.beginTransaction();
297 		Simple simple = new Simple( Long.valueOf(10) );
298 		simple.setName("Simple 1");
299 		s.save( simple );
300 		t.commit();
301 		s.close();
302 
303 		s = openSession();
304 		t = s.beginTransaction();
305 		Query q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name=?");
306 		q.setCacheRegion("foo");
307 		q.setCacheable(true);
308 		q.setString(0, "Simple 1");
309 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
310 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
311 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
312 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name=:name");
313 		q.setCacheRegion("foo");
314 		q.setCacheable(true);
315 		q.setString("name", "Simple 1");
316 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
317 		simple = (Simple) q.list().get(0);
318 
319 		q.setString("name", "Simple 2");
320 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==0 );
321 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==0 );
322 		simple.setName("Simple 2");
323 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
324 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
325 		t.commit();
326 		s.close();
327 
328 		s = openSession();
329 		t = s.beginTransaction();
330 		s.update( simple );
331 		s.delete(simple);
332 		t.commit();
333 		s.close();
334 
335 		s = openSession();
336 		t = s.beginTransaction();
337 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name=?");
338 		q.setCacheRegion("foo");
339 		q.setCacheable(true);
340 		q.setString(0, "Simple 1");
341 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==0 );
342 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==0 );
343 		t.commit();
344 		s.close();
345 	}
346 
347 	@SuppressWarnings( {"UnnecessaryBoxing", "unchecked"})
348 	public void testSQLFunctions() throws Exception {
349 		Session s = openSession();
350 		Transaction t = s.beginTransaction();
351 		Simple simple = new Simple( Long.valueOf(10) );
352 		simple.setName("Simple 1");
353 		s.save(simple );
354 
355 		s.createQuery( "from Simple s where repeat('foo', 3) = 'foofoofoo'" ).list();
356 		s.createQuery( "from Simple s where repeat(s.name, 3) = 'foofoofoo'" ).list();
357 		s.createQuery( "from Simple s where repeat( lower(s.name), (3 + (1-1)) / 2) = 'foofoofoo'" ).list();
358 
359 		assertTrue(
360 				s.createQuery( "from Simple s where upper( s.name ) ='SIMPLE 1'" ).list().size()==1
361 		);
362 		assertTrue(
363 				s.createQuery(
364 						"from Simple s where not( upper( s.name ) ='yada' or 1=2 or 'foo'='bar' or not('foo'='foo') or 'foo' like 'bar' )"
365 				).list()
366 						.size()==1
367 		);
368 
369 		assertTrue(
370 				s.createQuery( "from Simple s where lower( s.name || ' foo' ) ='simple 1 foo'" ).list().size()==1
371 		);
372 		assertTrue(
373 				s.createQuery( "from Simple s where lower( concat(s.name, ' foo') ) ='simple 1 foo'" ).list().size()==1
374 		);
375 
376 		Simple other = new Simple( Long.valueOf(20) );
377 		other.setName( "Simple 2" );
378 		other.setCount( 12 );
379 		simple.setOther( other );
380 		s.save( other );
381 		//s.find("from Simple s where s.name ## 'cat|rat|bag'");
382 		assertTrue(
383 				s.createQuery( "from Simple s where upper( s.other.name ) ='SIMPLE 2'" ).list().size()==1
384 		);
385 		assertTrue(
386 				s.createQuery( "from Simple s where not ( upper( s.other.name ) ='SIMPLE 2' )" ).list().size()==0
387 		);
388 		assertTrue(
389 				s.createQuery(
390 						"select distinct s from Simple s where ( ( s.other.count + 3 ) = (15*2)/2 and s.count = 69) or ( ( s.other.count + 2 ) / 7 ) = 2"
391 				).list()
392 						.size()==1
393 		);
394 		assertTrue(
395 				s.createQuery(
396 						"select s from Simple s where ( ( s.other.count + 3 ) = (15*2)/2 and s.count = 69) or ( ( s.other.count + 2 ) / 7 ) = 2 order by s.other.count"
397 				).list()
398 						.size()==1
399 		);
400 		Simple min = new Simple( Long.valueOf(30) );
401 		min.setCount( -1 );
402 		s.save(min );
403 
404 		assertTrue(
405 				s.createQuery( "from Simple s where s.count > ( select min(sim.count) from Simple sim )" )
406 						.list()
407 						.size()==2
408 		);
409 		t.commit();
410 		t = s.beginTransaction();
411 		assertTrue(
412 				s.createQuery(
413 						"from Simple s where s = some( select sim from Simple sim where sim.count>=0 ) and s.count >= 0"
414 				).list()
415 						.size()==2
416 		);
417 		assertTrue(
418 				s.createQuery(
419 						"from Simple s where s = some( select sim from Simple sim where sim.other.count=s.other.count ) and s.other.count > 0"
420 				).list()
421 						.size()==1
422 		);
423 
424 		Iterator iter = s.createQuery( "select sum(s.count) from Simple s group by s.count having sum(s.count) > 10" )
425 				.iterate();
426 		assertTrue( iter.hasNext() );
427 		assertEquals( Long.valueOf( 12 ), iter.next() );
428 		assertTrue( !iter.hasNext() );
429 		iter = s.createQuery( "select s.count from Simple s group by s.count having s.count = 12" ).iterate();
430 		assertTrue( iter.hasNext() );
431 
432 		s.createQuery(
433 				"select s.id, s.count, count(t), max(t.date) from Simple s, Simple t where s.count = t.count group by s.id, s.count order by s.count"
434 		).iterate();
435 
436 		Query q = s.createQuery("from Simple s");
437 		q.setMaxResults( 10 );
438 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==3 );
439 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s");
440 		q.setMaxResults( 1 );
441 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
442 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s");
443 		assertTrue( q.list().size() == 3 );
444 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name = ?");
445 		q.setString( 0, "Simple 1" );
446 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
447 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name = ? and upper(s.name) = ?");
448 		q.setString(1, "SIMPLE 1");
449 		q.setString( 0, "Simple 1" );
450 		q.setFirstResult(0);
451 		assertTrue( q.iterate().hasNext() );
452 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name = :foo and upper(s.name) = :bar or s.count=:count or s.count=:count + 1");
453 		q.setParameter( "bar", "SIMPLE 1" );
454 		q.setString( "foo", "Simple 1" );
455 		q.setInteger("count", 69);
456 		q.setFirstResult(0);
457 		assertTrue( q.iterate().hasNext() );
458 		q = s.createQuery("select s.id from Simple s");
459 		q.setFirstResult(1);
460 		q.setMaxResults( 2 );
461 		iter = q.iterate();
462 		int i=0;
463 		while ( iter.hasNext() ) {
464 			assertTrue( iter.next() instanceof Long );
465 			i++;
466 		}
467 		assertTrue( i == 2 );
468 		q = s.createQuery("select all s, s.other from Simple s where s = :s");
469 		q.setParameter("s", simple);
470 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
471 
472 
473 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name in (:name_list) and s.count > :count");
474 		HashSet set = new HashSet();
475 		set.add("Simple 1");
476 		set.add("foo");
477 		q.setParameterList( "name_list", set );
478 		q.setParameter("count", new Integer(-1) );
479 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
480 
481 		ScrollableResults sr = s.createQuery("from Simple s").scroll();
482 		sr.next();
483 		sr.get(0);
484 		sr.close();
485 
486 		s.delete( other );
487 		s.delete( simple );
488 		s.delete( min );
489 		t.commit();
490 		s.close();
491 
492 	}
493 
494 	public void testBlobClob() throws Exception {
495 		Session s = openSession();
496 		s.beginTransaction();
497 		Blobber b = new Blobber();
498 		b.setBlob( s.getLobHelper().createBlob( "foo/bar/baz".getBytes() ) );
499 		b.setClob( s.getLobHelper().createClob("foo/bar/baz") );
500 		s.save(b);
501 		//s.refresh(b);
502 		//assertTrue( b.getClob() instanceof ClobImpl );
503 		s.flush();
504 		s.refresh(b);
505 		//b.getBlob().setBytes( 2, "abc".getBytes() );
506         log.debug("levinson: just bfore b.getClob()");
507         b.getClob().getSubString(2, 3);
508 		//b.getClob().setString(2, "abc");
509 		s.flush();
510 		s.getTransaction().commit();
511 		s.close();
512 
513 		s = openSession();
514 		s.beginTransaction();
515 		b = (Blobber) s.load( Blobber.class, new Integer( b.getId() ) );
516 		Blobber b2 = new Blobber();
517 		s.save(b2);
518 		b2.setBlob( b.getBlob() );
519 		b.setBlob(null);
520 		//assertTrue( b.getClob().getSubString(1, 3).equals("fab") );
521 		b.getClob().getSubString(1, 6);
522 		//b.getClob().setString(1, "qwerty");
523 		s.flush();
524 		s.getTransaction().commit();
525 		s.close();
526 
527 		s = openSession();
528 		s.beginTransaction();
529 		b = (Blobber) s.load( Blobber.class, new Integer( b.getId() ) );
530 		b.setClob( s.getLobHelper().createClob("xcvfxvc xcvbx cvbx cvbx cvbxcvbxcvbxcvb") );
531 		s.flush();
532 		s.getTransaction().commit();
533 		s.close();
534 
535 		s = openSession();
536 		s.beginTransaction();
537 		b = (Blobber) s.load( Blobber.class, new Integer( b.getId() ) );
538 		assertTrue( b.getClob().getSubString(1, 7).equals("xcvfxvc") );
539 		//b.getClob().setString(5, "1234567890");
540 		s.flush();
541 		s.getTransaction().commit();
542 		s.close();
543 	}
544 
545 	@SuppressWarnings( {"UnnecessaryBoxing"})
546 	public void testSqlFunctionAsAlias() throws Exception {
547 		String functionName = locateAppropriateDialectFunctionNameForAliasTest();
548 		if (functionName == null) {
549             log.info("Dialect does not list any no-arg functions");
550 			return;
551 		}
552 
553         log.info("Using function named [" + functionName + "] for 'function as alias' test");
554 		String query = "select " + functionName + " from Simple as " + functionName + " where " + functionName + ".id = 10";
555 
556 		Session s = openSession();
557 		Transaction t = s.beginTransaction();
558 		Simple simple = new Simple( Long.valueOf(10) );
559 		simple.setName("Simple 1");
560 		s.save( simple );
561 		t.commit();
562 		s.close();
563 
564 		s = openSession();
565 		t = s.beginTransaction();
566 		List result = s.createQuery( query ).list();
567 		assertTrue( result.size() == 1 );
568 		assertTrue(result.get(0) instanceof Simple);
569 		s.delete( result.get(0) );
570 		t.commit();
571 		s.close();
572 	}
573 
574 	@SuppressWarnings( {"ForLoopReplaceableByForEach"})
575 	private String locateAppropriateDialectFunctionNameForAliasTest() {
576 		for (Iterator itr = getDialect().getFunctions().entrySet().iterator(); itr.hasNext(); ) {
577 			final Map.Entry entry = (Map.Entry) itr.next();
578 			final SQLFunction function = (SQLFunction) entry.getValue();
579 			if ( !function.hasArguments() && !function.hasParenthesesIfNoArguments() ) {
580 				return (String) entry.getKey();
581 			}
582 		}
583 		return null;
584 	}
585 
586 	@SuppressWarnings( {"UnnecessaryBoxing"})
587 	public void testCachedQueryOnInsert() throws Exception {
588 		Session s = openSession();
589 		Transaction t = s.beginTransaction();
590 		Simple simple = new Simple( Long.valueOf(10) );
591 		simple.setName("Simple 1");
592 		s.save( simple );
593 		t.commit();
594 		s.close();
595 
596 		s = openSession();
597 		t = s.beginTransaction();
598 		Query q = s.createQuery("from Simple s");
599 		List list = q.setCacheable(true).list();
600 		assertTrue( list.size()==1 );
601 		t.commit();
602 		s.close();
603 
604 		s = openSession();
605 		t = s.beginTransaction();
606 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s");
607 		list = q.setCacheable(true).list();
608 		assertTrue( list.size()==1 );
609 		t.commit();
610 		s.close();
611 
612 		s = openSession();
613 		t = s.beginTransaction();
614 		Simple simple2 = new Simple( Long.valueOf(12) );
615 		simple2.setCount(133);
616 		s.save( simple2 );
617 		t.commit();
618 		s.close();
619 
620 		s = openSession();
621 		t = s.beginTransaction();
622 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s");
623 		list = q.setCacheable(true).list();
624 		assertTrue( list.size()==2 );
625 		t.commit();
626 		s.close();
627 
628 		s = openSession();
629 		t = s.beginTransaction();
630 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s");
631 		list = q.setCacheable(true).list();
632 		assertTrue( list.size()==2 );
633 		for ( Object o : list ) {
634 			s.delete( o );
635 		}
636 		t.commit();
637 		s.close();
638 
639 	}
640 
641     @SuppressWarnings( {"UnnecessaryBoxing", "UnnecessaryUnboxing"})
642 	public void testInterSystemsFunctions() throws Exception {
643         Calendar cal = new GregorianCalendar();
644         cal.set(1977,6,3,0,0,0);
645         java.sql.Timestamp testvalue = new java.sql.Timestamp(cal.getTimeInMillis());
646         testvalue.setNanos(0);
647         Calendar cal3 = new GregorianCalendar();
648         cal3.set(1976,2,3,0,0,0);
649         java.sql.Timestamp testvalue3 = new java.sql.Timestamp(cal3.getTimeInMillis());
650         testvalue3.setNanos(0);
651 
652         final Session s = openSession();
653         s.beginTransaction();
654         try {
655 			s.doWork(
656 					new Work() {
657 						@Override
658 						public void execute(Connection connection) throws SQLException {
659 							Statement stmt = ((SessionImplementor)s).getTransactionCoordinator().getJdbcCoordinator().getStatementPreparer().createStatement();
660 							((SessionImplementor)s).getTransactionCoordinator().getJdbcCoordinator().getResultSetReturn().executeUpdate( stmt, "DROP FUNCTION spLock FROM TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass" );
661 						}
662 					}
663 			);
664         }
665         catch (Exception ex) {
666             System.out.println("as we expected stored procedure sp does not exist when we drop it");
667 
668         }
669 		s.getTransaction().commit();
670 
671         s.beginTransaction();
672 		s.doWork(
673 				new Work() {
674 					@Override
675 					public void execute(Connection connection) throws SQLException {
676 						Statement stmt = ((SessionImplementor)s).getTransactionCoordinator().getJdbcCoordinator().getStatementPreparer().createStatement();
677 						String create_function = "CREATE FUNCTION SQLUser.TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass_spLock\n" +
678 								"     ( INOUT pHandle %SQLProcContext, \n" +
679 								"       ROWID INTEGER \n" +
680 								" )\n" +
681 								" FOR User.TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass " +
682 								"    PROCEDURE\n" +
683 								"    RETURNS INTEGER\n" +
684 								"    LANGUAGE OBJECTSCRIPT\n" +
685 								"    {\n" +
686 								"        q 0\n" +
687 								"     }";
688 						((SessionImplementor)s).getTransactionCoordinator().getJdbcCoordinator().getResultSetReturn().executeUpdate( stmt, create_function );
689 					}
690 				}
691 		);
692         s.getTransaction().commit();
693 
694         s.beginTransaction();
695 
696         TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass object = new TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass( Long.valueOf( 10 ) );
697         object.setDateText("1977-07-03");
698         object.setDate1( testvalue );
699         object.setDate3( testvalue3 );
700         s.save( object );
701         s.getTransaction().commit();
702         s.close();
703 
704         Session s2 = openSession();
705         s2.beginTransaction();
706         TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass test = (TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass) s2.get(TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass.class, Long.valueOf(10));
707         assertTrue( test.getDate1().equals(testvalue));
708         test = (TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass) s2.get(TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass.class, Long.valueOf(10), LockMode.UPGRADE);
709         assertTrue( test.getDate1().equals(testvalue));
710         Date value = (Date) s2.createQuery( "select nvl(o.date,o.dateText) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o" )
711 				.list()
712 				.get(0);
713         assertTrue( value.equals(testvalue));
714         Object nv = s2.createQuery( "select nullif(o.dateText,o.dateText) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o" )
715 				.list()
716 				.get(0);
717         assertTrue( nv == null);
718         String dateText = (String) s2.createQuery(
719 				"select nvl(o.dateText,o.date) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o"
720 		).list()
721 				.get(0);
722         assertTrue( dateText.equals("1977-07-03"));
723         value = (Date) s2.createQuery( "select ifnull(o.date,o.date1) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o" )
724 				.list()
725 				.get(0);
726         assertTrue( value.equals(testvalue));
727         value = (Date) s2.createQuery( "select ifnull(o.date3,o.date,o.date1) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o" )
728 				.list()
729 				.get(0);
730         assertTrue( value.equals(testvalue));
731         Integer pos = (Integer) s2.createQuery(
732 				"select position('07', o.dateText) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o"
733 		).list()
734 				.get(0);
735         assertTrue(pos.intValue() == 6);
736         String st = (String) s2.createQuery( "select convert(o.date1, SQL_TIME) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o" )
737 				.list()
738 				.get(0);
739         assertTrue( st.equals("00:00:00"));
740         java.sql.Time tm = (java.sql.Time) s2.createQuery(
741 				"select cast(o.date1, time) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o"
742 		).list()
743 				.get(0);
744         assertTrue( tm.toString().equals("00:00:00"));
745         Double diff = (Double) s2.createQuery(
746 				"select timestampdiff(SQL_TSI_FRAC_SECOND, o.date3, o.date1) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o"
747 		).list()
748 				.get(0);
749         assertTrue(diff.doubleValue() != 0.0);
750         diff = (Double) s2.createQuery(
751 				"select timestampdiff(SQL_TSI_MONTH, o.date3, o.date1) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o"
752 		).list()
753 				.get(0);
754         assertTrue(diff.doubleValue() == 16.0);
755         diff = (Double) s2.createQuery(
756 				"select timestampdiff(SQL_TSI_WEEK, o.date3, o.date1) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o"
757 		).list()
758 				.get(0);
759         assertTrue(diff.doubleValue() >= 16*4);
760         diff = (Double) s2.createQuery(
761 				"select timestampdiff(SQL_TSI_YEAR, o.date3, o.date1) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o"
762 		).list()
763 				.get(0);
764         assertTrue(diff.doubleValue() == 1.0);
765 
766         s2.getTransaction().commit();
767         s2.close();
768     }
769 
770 }
